title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Saratoga BattlefieldVisitor Center:Open 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM daily, 7 days per week.  Scheduled to be closed only on Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year's Day.Battlefield Grounds:Open to pedestrian (hiking) use 7 days a week, sunrise to sunset.  Hiking trails are not maintained during the winter. Tour Road:General information:   Tour Road is normally open April 1 to the end of the first weekend of December, weather permitting. During this open season the road opens at 9:00 AM daily; closing times vary with the season, please call the Information Desk for details, 518-670-2985.   Schuyler House Open Memorial Day weekend through Labor Day,  Friday through Sunday, plus major holidays, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. In season, tour schedule is:9:00 - 9:45 AM9:45 - 10:30 AM10:30 - 11:15 AM11:15 AM to 12 noonclosed for lunch from 12 noon - 12:30 PM12:30 - 1:15 PM1:15 - 2:00 PM2:00 - 2:45 PM2:45 - 3:30 PM3:30 - 4:15 PM4:15 - 5:00 PM --last tour of the day Saratoga Monument Open Memorial Day weekend through Labor Day, Friday through Sunday, plus major holidays, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.  Final climb of the Monument starts at 4:45 PM. Victory WoodsOpen to pedestrian use 7 days a week, sunrise to sunset.  Walking path is not maintained during the winter.
